MESSAGE: Bye, hBun! Im headed outside.
Keep an eye on the house for me.
Make sure nothing breaks!
Hello, eShop??? Is- is there a problem??
Stealing??? I took a few games and kept them online for preservation!
Alright, I hear that somewhere around here, someone hid a copy of a rare 3DS game.
Hopefully nobody has taken it yet.

BROADCAST_INPUT: OH NO THEY ARE ATTACKING... AGAIN

MESSAGE: Is this Super Nintendo World?? That must mean im close to Nintendo HQ!
Well, im sure somebody is here to try and stop me.
I made it to Nintendo HQ! I cant believe it!
But that must mean.... Oh no.
What a lovely day!
On a day like today, i should be outside getting exercise.
Thats it. Lets fight.

MESSAGE: You have defeated the last of the eShop bags.
We accept our loss, and give you the eShop Orbs.
They will allow you to cast a shield, that can block certain attacks.
It doesnt block all attacks, though, so only use it when you cant dodge.
